title: 光诚.世界
content:
感谢所有关心支持光诚的朋友！”墨镜.肖像”活动于2012年2月16日发起”光诚.世界”活动！请大家帮忙转到墙内去！

光诚.世界

主题：虽然光诚被非法囚禁， 他的影像和精神走遍世界。

活动详细介绍请见：http://guangchengsworld.blogspot.com/p/about.html
活动网站：http://guangchengsworld.blogspot.com/

活动方法步骤：

1.在你生活或旅行的地方，用任何方法（风景，人物，涂鸦，海报，贴纸，明信片）为光诚的图片拍一张创意照片/录像；你可以选择，城市的风景区，公园，你最喜欢的图书馆，你的家，机场，街头，一个美丽的雕塑，一个城市广场……
2.将照片寄到 ichenguangcheng@gmail.com，只需写明拍摄地点(景点名称，城市，国家），时间和您的感受即可；
3.截至日期：陈光诚及其家人完全自由的那一天。
4.本活动的图片在如下网站展示，请翻墙访问这个网站：
http://guangchengsworld.blogspot.com/
5.请向您身边的家人或朋友说说陈光诚的遭遇，让更多人了解陈光诚，并自发参与到这个活动中来。谢谢！

Participation guide:
1.Print a picture/poster of Chen Guangcheng, and take a new picture/video with it in a place you like. Whether it is a tourist site in your city, a city where you are travelling, your favorite library, your favorite building, your home, a statue in a park, a city square, an airport …

2.Send your photo to this email address: ichenguangcheng@gmail.com. Please tell us where and when you took the picture ( site, city and country) and write a few words about your thoughts in the email, words limit under 50.

3.Deadline of this campaign: until Guangcheng and his family gain their freedom.

4.The photos received will be posted on the following website: http://guangchengsworld.blogspot.com/

5.Please tell the story of Chen Guangcheng to your family and friends. Please also help to forward this Campaign ‘Guangcheng & World’ to more people and let them know Guangcheng and show their support through participation in the campaign.

Thanks for your time. Let’s be together to support Guangcheng.
